original_text: You shall walk in all the way that the Lord your God has commanded you, that you may live, and that it may go well with you, and that you may live long in the land that you shall possess.
korean_text: 너희 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 명령하신 모든 도를 행하라 그리하면 너희가 살 것이요 복이 너희에게 있을 것이며 너희가 차지한 땅에서 너희의 날이 길리라

sentences.original_text: You shall walk in all the way
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 모든 길을 행해야 하느니라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God has commanded you
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 네 하나님 여호와께서 너에게 명령하신 것이요

sentences.original_text: and that it may go well with you
sentences.korean_translation: 또 너로 잘 되게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and that you may live long
in the land that you shall possess
